section.title: Schedule tasks
section.para: Java allows you to schedule tasks. A scheduled tasks can perform once or several times.
java.util.Timer and java.util.TimerTask can be used to schedule tasks. The object which implements TimeTask will then be performed by the Timer based on the given interval.

para.tip:
Improved job scheduling is available via the open source framework quartz. See
http://www.onjava.com/lpt/a/4637 or
http://www.quartz-scheduler.org/ for an explanation.
